channel.title: Comments on: A Brief History
channel.description: A detailed history of the Shona people of Zimbabwe

item.title: By: Fathazia Lenyatso
item.dc:creator: Fathazia Lenyatso
item.description:
Surprisingly the article talks about Venda being a product of Shona and and Sotho-Tswana languages the time when Shona was not in existence. Venda is a dialect of Kalanga and has no relation with what became Shona in the 19th century. Please do not distort our history for reasons best known to you alone.
Thank you.
item.content:encoded:
Surprisingly the article talks about Venda being a product of Shona and and Sotho-Tswana languages the time when Shona was not in existence. Venda is a dialect of Kalanga and has no relation with what became Shona in the 19th century. Please do not distort our history for reasons best known to you alone.

Thank you.

item.title: By: YACIE
item.dc:creator: YACIE
item.description: TAKA PIWA ZITA IRI NE MAARABHU, PAVAKA SVIKA MU DUNHU REDU VAONA GORIDHE RAKA ZARA. GORIDHE MUCHI ARABHU RINONZI SONA, DUNHU REDU VAKARITI DUNHU RE VANHU VE ‘SONA’ VAKATITI VANHU VE ‘SONA’ MUTAURO WEDU VAKAUTI CHI’SONA.’ KU KANGANISA KU TAURA NDIKO KWAKA ITA KUTI TIZOZVITI ‘MASHONA.
item.content:encoded: TAKA PIWA ZITA IRI NE MAARABHU, PAVAKA SVIKA MU DUNHU REDU VAONA GORIDHE RAKA ZARA. GORIDHE MUCHI ARABHU RINONZI SONA, DUNHU REDU VAKARITI DUNHU RE VANHU VE ‘SONA’ VAKATITI VANHU VE ‘SONA’ MUTAURO WEDU VAKAUTI CHI’SONA.’ KU KANGANISA KU TAURA NDIKO KWAKA ITA KUTI TIZOZVITI ‘MASHONA.

item.title: By: MASHONA MARSH

item.description: Yes Were did the name Mashona / Shona come from??? no body knows this why??
